DOC.HEADLINE: O.C. NEWSMAKERS
DOC.TEXT: * Roger F . Rodericks has been appointed vice_president of AST Europe Ltd . for AST Research Inc. , a personal_computer manufacturer based in Irvine.Rodericks has been managing director of AST Europe Ltd . since 1990 and will continue in that role . The company said part of his focus as vice_president will be to move AST into emerging Eastern European markets . Rodericks joined AST in 1984 as United Kingdom sales manager of its first overseas subsidiary .
